title: ISic000202. Fragmentary funerary plaque for a Nymp[hidia?]
body:
Facsimile Images

1D[..]
2NIMP[.....?---]
3IIVIX[---]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of autopsy;
  • line.2: While Bivona (1994) records Nimph as read in line 2, the are no visible traces of the H on the line (although given the name, is the most likely following letter).

translation

commentary

The lack of a praenomen at the beginning of line two suggests that the dedicatee is a woman, potentially Nimphidia.

bibliography

  • 1980.0530 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 125 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002137
  • Bivona 1975-1976 554 no.20 tav.9
